LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Damp: Damp has gotten into the knowledge stores and destroyed {0}. Its secrets have been lost to moisture and mold.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Insects: An aggressive insect hive has eaten through {0} and its secrets have been lost!
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Fade: The ink on {0} has mysteriously faded beyond recognition. The knowledge it contained is now illegible.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_Rodents: Rodents have nested in the archives and shredded {0} for bedding material. The knowledge is irretrievably lost.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_CleanUpS: {PAWN_nameDef} spilled their drink near a bookshelf. In {PAWN_possessive} haste, {PAWN_pronoun} used "{0}" to soak up the spill, rendering it unreadable.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_TP: {PAWN_nameDef} was caught short. In {PAWN_possessive} haste, {PAWN_pronoun} grabbed "{0}" to wipe with, leaving it a smeared useless mess.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_DecayMessage_PaperAir: {PAWN_nameDef} was making paper airplanes. While not paying attention, {PAWN_pronoun} grabbed "{0}". The plane flew straight out the window and into a dirty puddle, soaking away any ink and leaving it blank and muddy.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_TechRegressionDesc: Your colony's technological understanding has regressed. The loss of knowledge brings consequences. Choose which burden your people must bear.
LanguageData.EntropyFlavourPack_MustChoosePenalty: You must choose a burden to bear. This window cannot be closed until you make a selection.
